mindfulcards.title: Compassionate Heart
mindfulcards.activity: Spend one minute writing all the thing you like about yourself. What are you most proud of?
mindfulcards.action: What are you most proud of?

mindfulcards.title: Self Love
mindfulcards.activity: Sit in a comfortable spot. For one minute send kind wishes to yourself.

mindfulcards.title: Graditude
mindfulcards.activity: Pick the name of a family member and for one minute write down all the reasons you are grateful for them.
mindfulcards.action: Pick a family member and write down reasons you are grateful for them.

mindfulcards.title: Mindful Movement
mindfulcards.activity: Walk across the room in slow motion. Try to be as slow as possible. How do you feel after you have stopped?
